snippet: The oversubscribed fund, including $10.25 billion of capital from outside investors, is the largest in the history of Hellman & Friedman, which formed its first partnership in 1987.
abstract: The oversubscribed fund, including $10.25 billion of capital from outside investors, is the largest in the history of Hellman & Friedman, which formed its first partnership in 1987.

headline.main: Hellman & Friedman Raises $10.9 Billion for Private Equity Fund
